snippet: James Harden returned from injury to score 28 points and Jeremy Lin had his first career triple-double to lead the Houston Rockets to their third straight win, 106-92 over the Cleveland Cavaliers on Saturday night....

headline.print_headline: Lin Has Triple-Double as Rockets Down Cavs 106-92
headline.main: Lin Has Triple-Double as Rockets Down Cavs 106-92

lead_paragraph: James Harden returned from injury to score 28 points and Jeremy Lin had his first career triple-double to lead the Houston Rockets to their third straight win, 106-92 over the Cleveland Cavaliers on Saturday night.
